Package CCDD

Class CcddMacroHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddMacroHandler
public class CcddMacroHandler extends Object
CFS Command and Data Dictionary macro handler class

  • Constructor Details

    • CcddMacroHandler

      CcddMacroHandler(CcddMain ccddMain, List<String[]> macros)
      Macro handler class constructor used when setting the macros from a source other than those in the project database
      Parameters:
      ccddMain - Main class
      macros - List of string arrays containing macro names and the corresponding macro values

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • setHandlers

      protected void setHandlers(CcddVariableHandler variableHandler, CcddDataTypeHandler dataTypeHandler)
      Set the reference to the variable size handler class
      Parameters:
      variableHandler - Reference to the variable handler
      dataTypeHandler - Reference to the data type handler

    • getMacroData

      protected List<String[]> getMacroData()
      Get the macro data
      Returns:
      List of string arrays containing macro names and the corresponding macro values

    • setMacroData

      protected void setMacroData(List<String[]> macros)
      Set the macro data to the supplied list of macro definitions
      Parameters:
      macros - List of string arrays containing macro names and the corresponding unexpanded macro values

    • setMacroData

      protected void setMacroData()
      Set the macro data to the list of updated macro definitions

    • getMacroNames

      protected List<String> getMacroNames()
      Get the list of macro names
      Returns:
      List of macro names, sorted alphabetically; an empty list if no macros are defined

    • clearStoredValues

      protected void clearStoredValues()
      Clear the list of expanded macro values. This should be done following any change to a macro's unexpanded value so that the unexpanded value is reevaluated when next requested

    • getStoredMacroName

      protected String getStoredMacroName(String inputName)
      Get the the stored version of the supplied macro name. Macro names are case insensitive; however the name as used in the internal table can be needed
      Parameters:
      inputName - Name of the macro for which to get the stored name
      Returns:
      Macro name as stored in the internal macros table; null if the macro doesn't exist

    • getFullMacroName

      protected static String getFullMacroName(String macroName)
      Get the macro name encased in the macro identifier character(s)
      Parameters:
      macroName - Macro name
      Returns:
      Macro name encased in the macro identifier character(s)

    • getMacroLocation

      private List<CcddMacroHandler.MacroLocation> getMacroLocation(String text)
      Get a list of all macro name locations in the specified text string
      Parameters:
      text - Text string to search for macro names
      Returns:
      List of all macro name locations in the specified text string

    • replaceMacroName

      protected String replaceMacroName(String oldName, String newName, String text)
      Replace all instances of the specified macro name in the supplied text string
      Parameters:
      oldName - Original macro name, including the delimiters
      newName - New macro name, including the delimiters
      text - Text string in which to replace the macro name
      Returns:
      The supplied text string with all references to the specified macro replaced by the new macro name

    • replaceDataTypeReferences

      protected void replaceDataTypeReferences(String oldDataTypeName, String newDataTypeName)
      Replace all instances in all macros with sizeof() calls using the specified data type name with the new data type name
      Parameters:
      oldDataTypeName - Original data type name
      newDataTypeName - New data type name

    • isMacroRecursive

      protected boolean isMacroRecursive(String macroName)
      Check for any recursive reference in the specified macro's value
      Parameters:
      macroName - Macro name
      Returns:
      True if a recursive reference is detected in the macro's value

    • getMacroValue

      protected String getMacroValue(String macroName)
      Get the expanded value associated with the specified macro name. If the expanded value is already known (from a previous value request) then this known value is used; otherwise the macro's expanded value is evaluated from its unexpanded value
      Parameters:
      macroName - Name of the macro for which the value is needed
      Returns:
      Expanded value associated with the specified macro name; returns null if the macro doesn't exist. The isMacroRecursive flag will be set to true if the macro contains a recursive reference

    • getMacroValue

      private String getMacroValue(String macroName, List<String> referencedMacros)
      Get the value associated with the specified macro name. This is a recursive method for macros referencing other macros
      Parameters:
      macroName - Macro name
      referencedMacros - List containing the macros references in a macro value path. This list is used to detect if a macro references itself, which would cause an infinite loop. Set to null to not test for recursion
      Returns:
      Value associated with the specified macro name; returns null if the macro doesn't exist

    • hasMacro

      protected static boolean hasMacro(String text)
      Check if the supplied text contains any macro references
      Parameters:
      text - Text string containing macro names
      Returns:
      True if the text contains a macro reference

    • isMacroExists

      protected boolean isMacroExists(String macroName)
      Check if the supplied macro name is already in use (case insensitive)
      Parameters:
      macroName - Macro name
      Returns:
      True if the supplied macro name is already in use

    • getMacroIndex

      private int getMacroIndex(String macroName)
      Get the index for the macro with the supplied name (case insensitive)
      Parameters:
      macroName - Macro name
      Returns:
      Index for the macro with the supplied name; -1 if no macro with this name exists

    • getMacroExpansion

      protected String getMacroExpansion(String text)
      Replace any macro names and sizeof() calls embedded in the supplied text with the associated macro values and data type sizes
      Parameters:
      text - Text string possibly containing macro names and/or sizeof() calls
      Returns:
      Text string with any embedded macro names and sizeof() calls replaced with the associated macro values and data type sizes

    • getMacroExpansion

      protected String getMacroExpansion(String text, List<String> invalidDataTypes)
      Replace any macro names and sizeof() calls embedded in the supplied text with the associated macro values and data type sizes. If a list of invalid data types is supplied, sizeof() calls set an error flag if the referenced data type is in the list
      Parameters:
      text - Text string possibly containing macro names and/or sizeof() calls
      invalidDataTypes - List containing the invalid data types when evaluating sizeof() calls; null if there are no data type constraints for a sizeof() call
      Returns:
      Text string with any embedded macro names and sizeof() calls replaced with the associated macro values and data type sizes; if no macro or sizeof() call is present the text is returned unchanged

    • replaceAllMacros

      protected List<Object[]> replaceAllMacros(List<Object[]> array)
      Replace any macro names embedded in the supplied string array with the associated macro values
      Parameters:
      array - Array of strings containing macro names
      Returns:
      List array with any embedded macro names replaced with the associated macro values

    • replaceAllMacros

      protected CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo replaceAllMacros(CcddClassesDataTable.TableInfo data)
      Replace any macro names embedded in the supplied table information data with the associated macro values
      Parameters:
      data - Table information reference
      Returns:
      Table information reference with any embedded macro names replaced with the associated macro values

    • getReferencedMacros

      protected List<String> getReferencedMacros(String text)
      Get a list of macros referenced in the specified text string
      Parameters:
      text - Text string containing macro names
      Returns:
      List of macros referenced in the specified text string. A macro name only appears once in the list even if referenced multiple times in the text string

    • getStructureReferences

      protected List<String> getStructureReferences(String macroName)
      Get the list of structure names referenced in sizeof() calls in the specified macro
      Parameters:
      macroName - Macro name
      Returns:
      List of structure names referenced in sizeof() calls in the specified macro macro; and empty list if no structures are referenced or the macro doesn't exist

    • getDataTypeReferences

      protected List<String> getDataTypeReferences(String dataType)
      Get a list containing the macros that are dependent on the specified data type
      Parameters:
      dataType - Data type name for which to search
      Returns:
      List containing the macros that are dependent on the specified data type

    • getDependentMacros

      private void getDependentMacros(String macroName, List<String> dependentMacros)
      Add the name of specified macro and the names of all macros that depend on this macro's value to the supplied list. This is a recursive method
      Parameters:
      macroName - Name of the macro for which to find all dependent macros
      dependentMacros - List of macros that have a value that is dependent on a specified macro (list includes the specified macro)

    • searchMacroReferences

      protected String[] searchMacroReferences(String macroNames, Component parent)
      Get a list containing the search results in the project database for tables that reference the specified macro name(s). Include references in the custom values table
      Parameters:
      macroNames - Macro name(s) for which to search, separated by '|'
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      List containing the search results in the project database for tables that reference the specified macro name

    • initializeMacroUpdates

      protected void initializeMacroUpdates()
      (Re)initialize the lists for the macro modifications and macro definitions. This must be called prior to the first call to updateMacros(), or to clear the lists

    • updateMacros

      protected List<String> updateMacros(List<String[]> macroDefinitions, boolean replaceExisting)
      Add new macros and check for matches with existing ones
      Parameters:
      macroDefinitions - List of macro definitions
      replaceExisting - True to replace the value for an existing macro
      Returns:
      List of macro names for macros with values that differ between the existing macro and the supplied definitions

    • initializeReferences

      protected void initializeReferences()
      Initialize the list of already loaded macro references. This list is used when macros are altered via the macro editor or an import operation

    • getMacroReferences

      protected CcddMacroHandler.MacroReference getMacroReferences(String macroName, Component parent)
      Get the references to the specified macro in the tables. A list of loaded reference results is maintained so that a previous search for a macro can be reused (initializeReferences() must be called to clear this list, such as after a macro has been altered)
      Parameters:
      macroName - Macro name
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      Reference to the specified macro in the tables

    • getMacroUsage

      protected List<String> getMacroUsage(String macroName, Component parent)
      Get the list containing the name of every table that references the specified macro
      Parameters:
      macroName - Macro name
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      Reference to the specified macro in the tables; an empty list if the macro is unused

    • validateMacroUsage

      protected void validateMacroUsage(Component parent) throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
      Verify that the updated macros are valid for each instance where the macro is used (e.g., a table column with an input type of "Integer" can't accept a text string)
      Parameters:
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Throws:
      CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If a macro's value is invalid in an instance where the macro is used

    • validateMacroUsage

      protected void validateMacroUsage(String macroName, CcddMacroHandler newMacroHandler, Component parent) throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
      Verify that the updated macros are valid for each instance where the macro is used (e.g., a table column with an input type of "Integer" can't accept a text string)
      Parameters:
      macroName - Name of the macro to validate
      newMacroHandler - Reference to the macro handler that incorporates the macro updates
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Throws:
      CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If a macro's value is invalid in an instance where the macro is used

    • updateExistingMacroUsage

      protected void updateExistingMacroUsage(Component parent) throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
      Update all existing macro instances where the macro name or value has been changed. This method relies on calling updateMacros() to set the lists of modifications and updated macros
      Parameters:
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Throws:
      CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs updating an existing reference to a modified macro

    • highlightMacro

      protected void highlightMacro(Component component, String text, Color hightlightColor)
      Highlight any macros in the the specified text component
      Parameters:
      component - Reference to the table cell renderer component
      text - Cell value
      hightlightColor - Color used for highlighting the macro name

    • getMacroToolTipText

      protected String getMacroToolTipText(String text)
      Tool tip text showing any macro names embedded in the supplied text replaced with the associated macro values
      Parameters:
      text - Text string containing macro names
      Returns:
      Tool tip text string showing any embedded macro names in the supplied text replaced with the associated macro values

    • getMacroPopUpItems

      protected List<String> getMacroPopUpItems(JTextComponent textComp, CcddClassesDataTable.InputType inputType, List<String> validDataTypes)
      Get the list of items to display in the macro pop-up combo box
      Parameters:
      textComp - Text component over which to display the pop-up combo box and insert the selected macro name
      inputType - Input type of the text component (InputType)
      validDataTypes - List of valid data types from which to choose
      Returns:
      List of items to display in the macro pop-up combo box

    • getMacroPopUpToolTips

      protected List<String> getMacroPopUpToolTips()
      Get the list of tool tips for the items in the macro pop-up combo box
      Returns:
      List of tool tips for the items in the macro pop-up combo box
